segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy drying a plate, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, which makes the whole scene feel homey.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out onto the floor, and she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a puddle forming at her feet, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, a boy is climbing a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing there, reaching up for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, hoping the mom doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how everything seems normal from afar.
segments.speaker: PAR
